task.summary: Allow to disable the pageData feature
Fix a bug with i18next namespaces

[BREAKING CHANGES] Upgrade material-ui from 1.5.1 to 3.6.2
See https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/releases for more details
Upgrade postcss-import, postcss-loader, postcss-sass and precss
Add the ResponsiveModal component from Chefsquare (can be useful)
Add the ResponsiveModal component from Chefsquare (can be useful)
[WIP] Router refactoring - better LangSwitch and query params handling
Add a method to the server to check the validity of the given routes
Add colors to the terminal ðŸ‘§
Update the doc of some components
Use new React.memo feature on some components
Fix a bug in the router (lang hydration)
[WIP] documentation - add pages and starting page-builder component
Improve the way the server is handling the routes translations
Update, improve and fix tests + improve the router dispatcher
Add some env vars for production (actually staging on heroku)
Allow to keep dev tooling pages on production
Update env config to fix some issues on staging server
